channel.title: Snow+Jail
channel.description:
What's the interface id for snow on allstarscape v2 and how do I make a jail?
Thanks in advance[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 22, 2008, 08:06:59 pm[/size][hr]oh yeah I also wouldn't mind a few ideas on a christmas event(realistic though for a person who juts learned npc diologue, spawning items and npcs, and portals)

item.title: Snow+Jail
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

I made a Christmas Event. I made the item “Present” give you a random item and I made the presents spawn around trees.

Interfaces ids are the same on every server as they are handled by the client.

item.title: Snow+Jail
item.dc:creator: @_Ryan3 _Ryan
item.description:
@_Ryan3 wrote:

I won’t spoonfeed you snow ID you can easily find that. Make a command that would teleport the certain person like this.

 if (command.startsWith("jail") && playerRights > 1) {
                try {
                    String otherPName = command.substring(5);
                    int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                    if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                        client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                        p.toX = 2121
			p.toY = 4918
			p.action = 1;
                        p.sM(
                                "You have been jailed by " + playerName);
			sM("You have jailed "+p.playerName+".");
                    } else { 
                       sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                    }
                } catch (Exception e) { 
                    sM("Try entering a name you want to jail..");
                }
            }

And add something like this to

teleblock = true;

Christmas event Hmm…

Santa asks you to get him a chocolate bar and rewards you.

Read full topic

item.title: Snow+Jail
item.dc:creator: @oron oron
item.description:
@oron wrote:

About the second question:

You can find an enclosed area or building and then make a new command, that will tele the specified user to them coordinates.

Read full topic
